Formulas

‚ÑπÔ∏è Not every command would work without FAWE version of WorldEdit ‚Äì check links section at homepage

Get rid of all grass and flora:

Just use with brush set on 0. Removes grass/tall grass, flowers, leaves of any kind, and more!

//mask 17,17:1,17:2,17:3,17:4,18,18:1,18:2,18:3,18:4,31:1,175:2,31:2,175:3,157,32,37,38,38:1,38:2,38:3,38:4,38:5,38:6,38:7,38:8,39,40,106,162,161,161:1,162:1,100,mushroom_stem,lily_of_the_valley,brown_mushroom_block

Generating curved road:

  1. First build cross section of a road 1,2 or 3 blocks depth (higher depths can vastly decrease performance ‚ö†Ô∏è)
  2. Select created fragment
  3. //copy
  4. //br sweep
  5. Select road path by clicking left or right mouse button on every point it follows. It can handle even change in elevation.
    (If you are familiar with photoshop pen tool, it's good. This command works similar to it,
    and well as its equivalent requires a little bit of practice.)
  6. Click twice on last point to join
    (This technique while using more than 1 block of height can be used to generate curved tunnel, bridge or cannal!)

Place upper slabs:

//set minecraft:smooth_stone_slab[type=top]

Place a block in any orientation:

blocks like Oak Log can be placed in different directions

//set minecraft:oak_log[axis=z]

Generate chessboard:

(works only if you faceing 'south' ‚ö†Ô∏è)
//generate -ho 35 ((x%2)+z)%2==1

Deform terrain:

y -= expression == ‚Üë (up)
y = expression == ‚Üì (down)
//brush deform cyl y=log(2)

Generate hollow cylinder/ellipse:

//hcyl glass 10,15 10

Generate roundabout:

if we multiply the cosine, we get a border

//g -h 35:15 cos(sqrt(x^2+z^2)*5)/2

Replace the blocks while preserving their orientation:

//replace minecraft:oak_stairs ^minecraft:acacia_stairs

Generate mountains based on height map:

/brush height 50 https://i.imgur.com/JoSyq0z.png 0.1 0.7 -r

Cover two lines with plane of blocks:

(blocks cannot be connected only by corners in the first step)
//br spline [id] [radius]

Sagging rope:

//br catenary 35:4 1.1 0

Click and copy:

(shift + LPM for clear)
If odd try use bigger brush /size [size]

/br copypaste -r -a
